review_text: App crashes when I try to open my task list after the latest update.
Can't login since update. Keeps showing an error on iOS 17.
Data sync not working between my phone and tablet.
Please add a dark mode. Would be very helpful at night.
Would love to see calendar integration in future updates.
Amazing app! Love the new reminder feature.
Works perfectly for daily planning. Great experience overall.
App is very slow and takes too long to load tasks.
Too expensive for basic features. Not worth the price.
Poor customer service. No response to my emails.
Love the clean UI and simple design. Works perfectly!
Missing functionality like recurring task templates.
